resources.string: An introductory image to welcome users
Welcome to your Medical Assistant App, your personal guide to better health.
Stay hydrated. Drinking enough water is crucial for your overall health.
Eat a balanced diet. Include a variety of fruits and vegetables in your meals every day.
Exercise regularly. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate activity most days of the week.
Get enough sleep. Aim for 7-9 hours per night to help your body and mind recover.
